channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Elon Musk Reportedly Insisted on Troubled Tesla Doors After a Warning
item.description: Tesla's door worries are not going away.

item.title: 20 Years on, ‘The Christmas Invasion’ Is Still the Best ‘Doctor Who’ Christmas Special
item.description: As one of the most beloved traditions of contemporary 'Doctor Who' turns 20, we look back on why the special that started it all is still the gold standard.

item.title: Waymo and Santa Monica Will Go To Court Over Public Nuisance Allegations
item.description: Residents claim that the vehicles' shrieking noises keep them awake.

item.title: The year data centers went from backend to center stage
item.description: Data centers are no longer the boring tech issue they once were.

item.title: Is the Internet's time wrong? NIST warns servers may have lapsed due to a power outage
item.description: NIST warns specific public time servers may be inaccurate after a power outage disrupted atomic clock distribution.

item.title: Tesla’s Model 3 emergency door release controls are being investigated
item.description: A defect petition claims that the vehicles’ mechanical door release is hidden, unlabeled, and not intuitive to locate during emergencies. The U.S. auto safety regulator said on Wednesday it has opened a defect investigation into Tesla Model 3 compact sedans over concerns that emergency door release controls may not be easily accessible or clearly identifiable in an emergency....

item.title: How to watch Midnight Mass 2025 — live stream First Mass of the Nativity for free
item.description: The BBC bring live coverage of the First Mass of the Nativity. Here's how to watch Midnight Mass 2025 online and from anywhere.

item.title: Guess where all the NAND flash components are going? The 8th (yes, eighth) 245TB SSD has been announced amidst race to quench AI storage thirst of hyperscalers
item.description: DapuStor announces a 245TB class SSD as AI workloads continue to shape flash storage priorities in hyperscale data centers.

item.title: Powerball’s Christmas Eve jackpot tops $1.7B—but here’s what you’d actually get
item.description: The massive Christmas Eve jackpot shrinks significantly once federal and state taxes are factored in. It may be a very Merry Christmas for one lucky Powerball winner. The Christmas Eve Powerball jackpot is accumulating like a snowball tumbling down an epic sledding hill. The total is now so large, it’s a number rarely attainable even for high-stakes gamblers....

item.title: S&P 500 reaches a record high as ‘Santa Claus rally’ kicks off
item.description: The S&P 500 gained 10.24 points, or 0.15%, to 6,920.24. The S&P 500 hit a record high on Wednesday, with broad gains across sectors supporting the main indexes during a shortened Christmas Eve session.
